channel.title: Grid on TARUN LALWANI

item.title: Re-using existing browser session with Selenium Grid
item.description: In our previous articles we discussed about re-using Browser session in Selenium for local browsers. We spoke about saving the Session ID and the Executor URL for re-creating the sessions. Now let’s us have re-look at the approach when we use Selenium Grid Launching the Grid I am using brew to install selenium-server-standalone on my Mac. But if you are using something else, then download the latest version from here
